27616.「猫島に ヒポポ・サードンのことを\n 報告に行ったんニャが マンマーさまに\n:
I went to Cat Island to report about Hippo
Sardon whereabouts, but I got turned
away by the Queen.

27617.「アヤツを オレひとりのチカラで倒して\n マンマーさまに ゆるしてもらおうと\:
I was ready to defeat him on my own
after finding him, I really need to be
furgiven by my Queen...

27618.「あー ミャルジなら いないニャ。\n 猫島の様子を 見にいってるのニャよ。:
Huh? Where's Myarji you say? He's currently
checking if anything happens to Cat Island.

27619.「もう帰ってきても いい頃なんだがニャー。\n ミャルジのヤツ 遅いのニャー。:
He should be back by now. But this is
rare, he never arrives THIS late.

27622.「ミャルジーっ。どうしたのニャー！\n しっかりするのニャーーーー！！:
Myarji, my boy! W-who did this to you!?
Purr yourself together!!

27623.「大変でヤンス……。猫島が……猫島が\n ヒポポ・サードンに 襲われてる……でヤ:
T-this is bad... C-Cat... Cat I-Island is
being attacked b-by.... Hippo S-Sar..don.

27624.「リベリオの旦那……。アッシに かまわず\n マンマーさまと ジュニアさまを……:
B-Boss... Y-You should go there and p-
protect Queen Momma, C-Catrick, and
everyone else, no matter what... please...

27626.「うおーん ミャルジーっ！\n ミャルジよーーーーーーーっ！！: No-no NO! Don't leave me Myarji... please....

27627.「くっ……ミャルジよ。オレは 行くニャ。\n オマエの死は ムダにはしないのニャ:
Mgrr... Myarji. It's time for me to go,
I WON'T let your efforts be in vain...

27628.「ヒポポ・サードン！ 覚悟するのニャーーー！！: Hippo Sardon! Prepare to face all of my wrath!

27630.「ちょっと 芝居が過ぎたでヤンスかねえ。\n でも これで リベリオの旦那も\n:
I might have overdone the c-act but,
this should motivate my Boss for sure.

27631.「ミャハッ。<pc>さま。\n アッシの死は 芝居でヤンしたが\n 猫島が危ない:
Nya-ha! <pc>, hear meowt! 
Even though my death was just an act, I
wasn't lying about Cat Island's state.

27632.「ヒポポ・サードンが 大勢の手下を連れて\n 大暴れしてるんでヤンスよ！:
Hippo Sardon is causing mayhem with his
group and new subordinates!

27633.「仲間のネコたちが 応戦してるでヤンスが\n どれだけ 持ちこたえられるか……。:
Our fellow cats are fighting back, but,
I wonder how long they can hold on...

27634.「旦那は カンジンなところで\n ドジをかますことが 多いでヤンスから\n <p:
And as always, I'm worried about my Boss
because... he tends to be clumsy at crucial
times so, please help me-owt <pc>.

27635.「猫島に行って リベリオの旦那と共に\n サードンを やっつけてほしいでヤンス。:
Purr-ease go to Cat Island and put an
end to Hippo Sardon alongside my Boss!
I'm counting on nya~!

27636.「ありがたミャー。<pc>さまは\n 猫島へ 向かってほしいでヤンス。:
Thank you so meowch! I wish nya the
best on your way to Cat Island~!

27637.「もちろん アッシも行くでヤンスよ！\n リベリオの旦那 待ってておくれでヤンス:
Of course I'm going too! I promised to always
follow my Boss, don't leave me behind~!

27638.「ミャー？ <pc>さまは\n 他の頼まれごとで 忙しいようでヤンスね……。:
Meow-huh? It seems that <pc> is busy
with many more requests...

27639.「そいつらを すぐに片付けてきちゃあ\n もらえねえでヤンスか。その間 アッシは:
Can't you go clean them up and then come back?
I'll check on Cat Island in the meantime.

27640.「そんミャー……。<pc>さまは\n リベリオの旦那を 見殺しにするって\n そ:
Im-paw-ssible... Are you really going
to let my boss die in there?

27641.「……失礼しヤンした。<pc>さまが\n そんなお人でねえことは わかってるでヤ:
...I'm sorry, I know you're not that kind
of person but, in the meantime I'm gonna
check the state of Cat Island...

27642.「ミャハーッ。<pc>さま。\n ヒポポ・サードンが 大勢の手下を連れて\n 猫:
Nya-ha, Hey <pc>. Hippo Sardon
is causing mayhem on Cat Island with
a large number of subordinates!

27643.「仲間のネコたちが 応戦してるでヤンスが\n どれだけ 持ちこたえられるか……。:
Our fellow cats are fighting back, but,
I wonder how long they can hold on...
<pc>, can nya help us out?

27644.「猫島に行って リベリオの旦那と共に\n ヒポポ・サードンを やっつけるのでヤン:
Purr-ease go to Cat Island and put an
end to Hippo Sardon alongside my Boss!
I'm counting on nya~!

27645.「ヒポポ・サードン！ キサマ……。\n 言いたいことは それだけかニャッ！？:
Hippo Sardon! You bastard...
Is that all you have to say!?

27646.「おぬしにとって 悪い話ではないドン？\n ワシと 手を組むだけでいいのだド。\:
It's not a bad deal for you, isn't it?
Just join forces with me and you'll be free
to do whatever you want in Cat Island.

27647.「その やり方は あいかわらずだニャ。\n 新しい手下たちも うまいこと言って\:
It looks like you haven't changed those old
methods. Did you manage to persuade new
subordinates by playing nice again?

27648.「だが このキャット・リベリオさまが\n そんな甘い言葉に乗ると 思うニャよ！:
But contrary to you, Cat Rebelio here
wouldn't fall for such sweet talk!

27649.「おぬしは マンマーによって 猫島から\n 追いだされたのでは なかったかド？\:
Weren't you driven from Cat Island by Momma?
There's no need to be loyal anymore, is there?

27650.「……オレは 追いだされても\n 仕方のないことを してしまったのニャ。:
...I know I did something that couldn't be
forgiven by just a mere apology.

27651.「だからオレは 今ここで キサマを倒して\n その罪をつぐなうのニャ！！:
That's why I'll defeat you here
and be forgiven once fur all!!

27653.「ドハハハァッ！ ならば 相手になるドン。\n かかってくるがいいドーン！！:
Dwa-hahahaha! Then it's a deal, I'll be
your opponent. Come at me fat furball!

27654.「<cs_pchero>！ 手出し無用ニャ。\n これは 決闘なのニャーーー！！:
Don't interfere <cs_pchero>!
This is a duel between Me and Sardon!

27656.「ドハハッ！ 猫魔族界 最強の剣豪の名が\n 聞いて あきれるドン。:
Dwahaha! This is the strength of the paw-some
swordsman? Don't make me laugh!

27657.「ぐうっ……。\n 目つぶしとは ひきょうニャ……。: Orrgh... I couldn't see that bastard...

27658.「おぬしは 群れがなくては 何もできない\n しょせんは あわれなノラネコだドン:
You can't do anything without relying on
others. In the end you're just a pitiful
alley cat.

27659.「さらばだドン。冥土へ旅立つがよいド。: Farewell. Meet your friends in the other side.

27661.「リベリオさまの イチの子分。\n ミャルジさま 参上でヤンス～！: Rebelio's trusty right hand, Myarji, is back~!

27662.「生きていたのニャ ミャルジ～～～！！\n さすが スーパー・不死身キャットなの:
IM-PAW-SSIBLE! You're alive, Myarji!!
As expected of the ultimate comrade!

27663.「リベリオの旦那を やろうっていうなら\n 相手になるでヤンスよ！:
If you want to take my Boss's life, fur-get
about it! This time he won't be alone~!

27664.「おぬしが ワシと戦うだド？\n ドハハハッ。笑わせるな チビスケ。:
You wanna fight me too? DwaHAHAHA!
Don't make me laugh you pathetic furball.

27665.「ミャッ。アッシじゃないでヤンス。\n そこにいる <cs_pchero>さまが:
W-Wait a meowment! I'm not referring to myself,
I'm talking about the person right there~!
Now sharpen those claws <cs_pchero>!

27666.「……ドハハハッ リベリオは倒したドン。\n もうワシに勝てる者など おらんド！:
...Dwahahaha! Rebelio was easy to take out!
Just give up, no one else can defeat me!!

27667.「どのみち すべて 始末するつもりだドン。\n おぬしから 冥土に送ってやるド。:
I'm going to wreck everything anyway.
But first, prepare to meet the other side!

27669.「<cs_pchero>さま お願いするでヤンス！\n ヒポポ・サードンを やっ:
<cs_pchero>, please!!
For the sake of Cat Island, please
defeat Hippo Sardon~!

27670.「ぬう？ おぬし 冥土に送ったと思ったが\n まだ 生きておったのかドン。:
Huh? But I sent you to the other side a
moment ago. How did you come back...

27671.「ならば 今度こそ 戻ってこれぬよう\n 冥土の奥底へ たたき落としてくれるドー:
This time, I'll make sure you don't
come back. I'm gonna send you to
the depths of the netherworld!

27673.「ぬおお……ワシが敗れるだド……。\n なんたる不覚……だドン……。:
No... I've been... defeated.
What a disgrace... Boom...

27674.「ミャハッ。さすがでヤンス <cs_pchero>さま。\n リベリオの旦那も勝:
Nyahaha-HA! You've outdone purrself!
<cs_pchero> wins~! Not even
my boss could defeat that guy!

27675.「ぐっ……情けないのニャ……。\n こんなんじゃ マンマーさまに\n ゆるしても:
I'm so pathetic... Momma won't forgive
me after what she's seen here.

27676.「リベリオよ。そなたは これまで\n <cs_pchero>に頼り ソーミャに頼:
Rebelio, you relied on <cs_pchero>
for all of your tasks, and even Somya...
Once again leaving everything to others.

27677.「……しかし今 この猫島のため 命をかけて\n ひとりで戦う姿 しかと見させても:
...However, I witnessed everything.
The way you fought, and all the risks you
were willing to take for Cat Island.

27678.「わらわは そなたをゆるそう。\n これからは また以前のように\n この島に身:
I forgive you. And from here on out, you
are free to return to the island.

27680.「よかったね リベリオ。\n もう ジュニアちゃんを いじめちゃ\n ダメなんだ:
I'm happy for you, Rebelio. And don't forget,
you mustn't bully Baby Catrick anymore.

27682.「<cs_pchero>。心の友よ。\n ヒポポ・サードンを よくぞ倒してくれた:
<cs_pchero>, my dear friend. Thank
you so meowch for defeating Hippo Sardon.
I'll fur-ever be in your debt.

27683.「コイツは オレのとっておきなのニャ。\n 受け取ってほしいのニャ。:
And that's why I have a verrry special
gift for you. Please accept it!

27684.「アッシからも 礼を言うでヤンス。\n リベリオの旦那のために いろいろと\n:
I wanya thank you too, <cs_pchero>.
Thanks for everything you've done for Boss~!

27685.「これで 猫島の平和は守られた。\n <cs_pchero>の名は 猫島の救世主:
With this, Cat Island's peace is ensured.
And the name "<cs_pchero>" will
forever be known as Cat Island's savior.

27686.「これで ジュニアちゃんも 安心できますね。\n 私は 町に帰ります マンマーさ:
Thanks to this, Catrick can rest safely.
Your majesty, I'm heading back to town.

27687.「ソーミャ。そなたも よく来てくれたな。:
Somya, I am grateful for your bravery and
your concern for all of us. Thanks for
coming.

27688.「ううん。何もできなくて ごめんなさい。\n ジュニアちゃんが心配で 来ちゃった:
N-no... I'm sorry I couldn't do anything.
I just came here because I was worried
about Catrick's state.

27689.「ソーミャよ。そなたは 今\n ひとりきりで 町で暮らしているのだったな。:
Somya, dear. You're currently living alone
in the town of Julet, aren't you?

27690.「よければ そなたも ここで暮らさぬか？\n ジュニアも よろこぶぞ？:
If you'd like, would you consider living
here with us? I know Catrick would love that~

27692.「……ありがとう マンマーさん。\n でも それは お断りします。:
...Your majesty. I'm very grateful for the
offer, but... I have to decline.

27693.「ひとりで生きていくのって 大変です。\n でも 私は ヒューザ兄ちゃんと約束し:
It's hard to live on your own. But I made a
promise to my brother, Hyuza. I want to live
without having to depend on anyone.

27694.「もし お父さんと お母さんに会えたら\n ふたりの子は こんなに立派になったよ:
And if I ever meet my parents again, I want
to be able to tell them that their two children
have grown up to become such great people.

27695.「だから……。ひとりでも だいじょうぶです！:
So... even if I'm alone, I'll be fine on
my own!

27696.「そなたは 強いな……。\n そのような ちいさな身体に\n あふれんばかりの強:
That will of yours never ceases to amaze me...
to have such strength within a small body.

27698.「ひとりで 何かをやるってことは\n 誰かにやれって言われて やることじゃない。:
Doing something on your own means thinking
for yourself and living your own life.
It's not just following someone's orders.

27699.「マンマーさま。おゆるしをいただいたばかりで\n 申し訳ありませんが 私は猫島を:
Dear Momma. I am sorry to say that I have just
received your Egg On, but I am going to leave
Cat Island and live by myself.

27700.「よくぞ言った リベリオよ。\n そなたが 自分で決めたことだ。\n わらわは:
Well said, Rebelio. You have made your own
decision. I will not stop you.

27701.「だが どこに行こうと そなたは\n 我ら猫島の仲間だ。それを忘れぬようにな。:
But wherever you go, you are our Cat Island
companions. Do not forget that.

27702.「ははっ ありがたき お言葉。: Thank you for your kind words.

27703.「これまで お世話になりましたのニャ。\n マンマーさまも ジュニアさまも\n:
Thank you for all the care you have given me.
Momma and Junior, please take care...

27704.「うむ。そなたも 達者でな。: Mm-hmm. You are also a master.

27705.「ミャーーー！ リベリオの旦那ぁ。\n アッシも 連れてってほしいでヤンス！！:
Meow! Boss!. I want you to take me
with you!

27706.「オレは ひとりで生きていくと決めたのニャ。\n オマエは 猫島のみんなを守るの:
I decided to live by myself. You will protect
everyone in Cat Island.

27707.「……そんなの ダメでヤンス！\n アッシは どこまでも 旦那に\n ついていく:
You can't do that! I'm determined to follow my
husband wherever he leads!

27708.「なんだか ライバルができたって 気がするよ。\n 私も 負けないようにしなきゃ:
I feel like I have a rival. I have to make
sure I don't lose too.

27709.「早く大きくなって お父さんと お母さんを\n 探しにいこうと 思ってるの。\n:
I'm thinking of growing up fast and going to
look for my mom and dad. I will continue to do
my best on my own!

46108.「オレが マンマーさまのお部屋に\n サードンを おびきよせたいとか\n 余計な:
It's my fault for saying something stupid like
I wanted to lure Sardon to Momma's room...

46109.「そんで サードンを探しだして\n 倒してやろうと がんばったんニャが\n まっ:
After that, I continued my search to find
and defeat Sardon, only to fail once again
in the search.
